oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bayless Hardware Company
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Bayless Hardware Company located on Jackson and Madison Streets. Painted on the side of the building are pictures of a table and a piano, and a sign about undertaking supplies. There is a drain in the middle of the street.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hardware stores; Stores & shops; Signs (Notices); Painted wall signs; Buildings; Pianos
